descr: A Yakiniku Dining Experience Merging Tradition and Modern Design. Discover the serene beauty of wabi-sabi philosophy in our interior design, featuring organic textures and natural patterns. Enjoy an intimate dining experience with textured black walls, warm wooden accents, and the iconic red Akabeko cow centerpiece.

Elite Luxury Hospitality for Entrepreneurs. NAS House offers a private, exclusive community of 150 members with Boho-inspired interiors by 4SPACE Design. Enjoy vibrant communal spaces, including a courtyard with an olive tree, firepit, and amphitheater, fostering interaction and collaboration in a unique luxury hospitality-meets-office environment.

Spanning an impressive 3,000 sqm, this awe-inspiring project transports guests to a realm where surrealism reigns supreme. Wander through gardens where gravity defies convention, where stars harmonize in cosmic symphonies, and where flowers bloom in the ethereal embrace of moon dust.

In collaboration with Emaar Entertainment, we've forged a virtual reality park that redefines the limits of possibility, promising an unforgettable journey for all who enter. This is a space that isn't just immersive, but visually stunning. Welcome to the future of entertainment.
